title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash

**Product Overview:**

Experience the perfect blend of style and functionality with our Realspace® Magellan Manager's Computer Desk. With its generous width of 59 inches, this desk is designed to accommodate all your workspace needs, whether you're working from home or in a professional setting.

**Material and Finish:**

Crafted from high-quality medium-density fiberboard, this desk is built to last. The paper laminate finish, in a warm Blonde Ash color, not only adds to its aesthetic appeal but also ensures durability. The inner drawer color may vary, adding a unique touch to your workspace.

**Storage and Organization:**

This desk offers ample storage options to keep your workspace clutter-free. It features a total of 4 drawers, including a slide-out keyboard tray for your convenience, a dedicated file drawer for your documents, and 3 box drawers for miscellaneous items.

**Resistance and Durability:**

The Realspace® Magellan Desk is designed with resistance in mind. It is both scratch-resistant and water-spill-resistant, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of daily use.

**Compliance Standards:**

This desk adheres to the ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring it meets high standards of safety, durability, and structural integrity.

**Assembly and Handling:**

Assembly is required for this product. Please note that due to its size and weight, this desk may require more than one person to handle and assemble. In-home assembly service is available; please contact 866-388-4350 for assistance.

Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, a perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability.
